snippet.title: Dungeon Fighter Live: Fall of Hendon Myre - Trailer
snippet.description:
Dungeon Fighter is back and its better than ever. This hack and slash side scroller has revamped itself to be more story driven. Don't worry, you will still get to play as the slayer, gunner, or fighter in the game. Just expect a much more developed gameplay mechanic to go along with its intense action. Don't be a fool, check out Microsoft's Dungeon Fighter Live: Fall of Hendon Myre later on this year. In the meanwhile, why don't you take a gander at the trailer?

Hack n' slash your way to IGN for more info:
http://xbox360.ign.com/objects/126/126777.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
